comment: "Did not write as I learned they don't pay."

"The Millions ... doesn't pay its contributors. The editor is nice and upfront about it -- but I think there should be some move to pay a fee, however small. On principle, I've stopped writing for them. "
relationship: Ongoing/pre-existing relationship with editor or publication

comment: "They didn'y pay me, but they do pay their staff writers. "
"“They didn’t pay me, but they do pay their staff writers.”"
